verses.verse: And it shall come to pass, if thou shalt hearken <WH8085> <WH8799> diligently <WH8085> <WH8800> unto the voice <WH6963> of the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, to observe <WH8104> <WH8800> and to do <WH6213> <WH8800> all his Mitzvot <WH4687> which I command <WH6680> <WH8764> thee this day <WH3117>, that the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> will set <WH5414> <WH8804> thee on high <WH5945> above all nations <WH1471> of the earth <WH776>:

And all these b'rakhot <WH1293> shall come <WH935> <WH8804> on thee, and overtake <WH5381> <WH8689> thee, if thou shalt hearken <WH8085> <WH8799> unto the voice <WH6963> of the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>.
Blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> shalt thou be in the city <WH5892>, and blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> shalt thou be in the field <WH7704>.

Blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> shall be the fruit <WH6529> of thy body <WH990>, and the fruit <WH6529> of thy ground <WH127>, and the fruit <WH6529> of thy cattle <WH929>, the increase <WH7698> of thy kine <WH504>, and the flocks <WH6251> of thy sheep <WH6629>.
Blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> shall be thy basket <WH2935> and thy store <WH4863>.
Blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> shalt thou be when thou comest in <WH935> <WH8800>, and blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> shalt thou be when thou goest out <WH3318> <WH8800>.

The YY <WH3068> shall cause <WH5414> <WH8799> thine enemies <WH341> <WH8802> that rise up <WH6965> <WH8801> against thee to be smitten <WH5062> <WH8737> before thy face <WH6440>: they shall come out <WH3318> <WH8799> against thee one <WH259> way <WH1870>, and flee <WH5127> <WH8799> before <WH6440> thee seven <WH7651> ways <WH1870>.

The YY <WH3068> shall command <WH6680> <WH8762> the b'rakhah <WH1293> upon thee in thy storehouses <WH618>, and in all that thou settest <WH4916> thine hand <WH3027> unto; and he shall bless <WH1288> <WH8765> thee in the land <WH776> which the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> giveth <WH5414> <WH8802> thee.

The YY <WH3068> shall establish <WH6965> <WH8686> thee an holy <WH6918> people <WH5971> unto himself, as he hath sworn <WH7650> <WH8738> unto thee, if thou shalt keep <WH8104> <WH8799> the Mitzvot <WH4687> of the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, and walk <WH1980> <WH8804> in his ways <WH1870>.

And all people <WH5971> of the earth <WH776> shall see <WH7200> <WH8804> that thou art called <WH7121> <WH8738> by the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068>; and they shall be afraid <WH3372> <WH8804> of thee.

And the YY <WH3068> shall make thee plenteous <WH3498> <WH8689> in goods <WH2896>, in the fruit <WH6529> of thy body <WH990>, and in the fruit <WH6529> of thy cattle <WH929>, and in the fruit <WH6529> of thy ground <WH127>, in the land <WH127> which the YY <WH3068> sware <WH7650> <WH8738> unto thy fathers <WH1> to give <WH5414> <WH8800> thee.

The YY <WH3068> shall open <WH6605> <WH8799> unto thee his good <WH2896> treasure <WH214>, the heaven <WH8064> to give <WH5414> <WH8800> the rain <WH4306> unto thy land <WH776> in his season <WH6256>, and to bless <WH1288> <WH8763> all the work <WH4639> of thine hand <WH3027>: and thou shalt lend <WH3867> <WH8689> unto many <WH7227> nations <WH1471>, and thou shalt not borrow <WH3867> <WH8799>.

And the YY <WH3068> shall make <WH5414> <WH8804> thee the head <WH7218>, and not the tail <WH2180>; and thou shalt be above only <WH4605>, and thou shalt not be beneath <WH4295>; if that thou hearken <WH8085> <WH8799> unto the Mitzvot <WH4687> of the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, which I command <WH6680> <WH8764> thee this day <WH3117>, to observe <WH8104> <WH8800> and to do <WH6213> <WH8800> them:

And thou shalt not go aside <WH5493> <WH8799> from any of the words <WH1697> which I command <WH6680> <WH8764> thee this day <WH3117>, to the right hand <WH3225>, or to the left <WH8040>, to go <WH3212> <WH8800> after <WH310> other <WH312> 'elohim <WH430> to serve <WH5647> <WH8800> them.

But it shall come to pass, if thou wilt not hearken <WH8085> <WH8799> unto the voice <WH6963> of the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, to observe <WH8104> <WH8800> to do <WH6213> <WH8800> all his Mitzvot <WH4687> and his statutes <WH2708> which I command <WH6680> <WH8764> thee this day <WH3117>; that all these curses <WH7045> shall come <WH935> <WH8804> upon thee, and overtake <WH5381> <WH8689> thee:
Cursed <WH779> <WH8803> shalt thou be in the city <WH5892>, and cursed <WH779> <WH8803> shalt thou be in the field <WH7704>.
Cursed <WH779> <WH8803> shall be thy basket <WH2935> and thy store <WH4863>.

Cursed <WH779> <WH8803> shall be the fruit <WH6529> of thy body <WH990>, and the fruit <WH6529> of thy land <WH127>, the increase <WH7698> of thy kine <WH504>, and the flocks <WH6251> of thy sheep <WH6629>.
Cursed <WH779> <WH8803> shalt thou be when thou comest in <WH935> <WH8800>, and cursed <WH779> <WH8803> shalt thou be when thou goest out <WH3318> <WH8800>.

The YY <WH3068> shall send <WH7971> <WH8762> upon thee cursing <WH3994>, vexation <WH4103>, and rebuke <WH4045>, in all that thou settest <WH4916> thine hand <WH3027> unto for to do <WH6213> <WH8799>, until thou be destroyed <WH8045> <WH8736>, and until thou perish <WH6> <WH8800> quickly <WH4118>; because <WH6440> of the wickedness <WH7455> of thy doings <WH4611>, whereby thou hast forsaken <WH5800> <WH8804> me.

The YY <WH3068> shall make the pestilence <WH1698> cleave <WH1692> <WH8686> unto thee, until he have consumed <WH3615> <WH8763> thee from off the land <WH127>, whither thou goest <WH935> <WH8802> to possess <WH3423> <WH8800> it.

The YY <WH3068> shall smite <WH5221> <WH8686> thee with a consumption <WH7829>, and with a fever <WH6920>, and with an inflammation <WH1816>, and with an extreme burning <WH2746>, and with the sword <WH2719>, and with blasting <WH7711>, and with mildew <WH3420>; and they shall pursue <WH7291> <WH8804> thee until thou perish <WH6> <WH8800>.
And thy heaven <WH8064> that is over thy head <WH7218> shall be brass <WH5178>, and the earth <WH776> that is under thee shall be iron <WH1270>.

The YY <WH3068> shall make <WH5414> <WH8799> the rain <WH4306> of thy land <WH776> powder <WH80> and dust <WH6083>: from heaven <WH8064> shall it come down <WH3381> <WH8799> upon thee, until thou be destroyed <WH8045> <WH8736>.

The YY <WH3068> shall cause <WH5414> <WH8799> thee to be smitten <WH5062> <WH8737> before <WH6440> thine enemies <WH341> <WH8802>: thou shalt go out <WH3318> <WH8799> one <WH259> way <WH1870> against them, and flee <WH5127> <WH8799> seven <WH7651> ways <WH1870> before <WH6440> them: and shalt be removed <WH2189> into all the kingdoms <WH4467> of the earth <WH776>.
And thy carcase <WH5038> shall be meat <WH3978> unto all fowls <WH5775> of the air <WH8064>, and unto the beasts <WH929> of the earth <WH776>, and no man shall fray them away <WH2729> <WH8688>.

The YY <WH3068> will smite <WH5221> <WH8686> thee with the botch <WH7822> of Egypt <WH4714>, and with the emerods <WH2914> <WH8675> <WH6076>, and with the scab <WH1618>, and with the itch <WH2775>, whereof thou canst <WH3201> <WH8799> not be healed <WH7495> <WH8736>.
The YY <WH3068> shall smite <WH5221> <WH8686> thee with madness <WH7697>, and blindness <WH5788>, and astonishment <WH8541> of heart <WH3824>:

And thou shalt grope <WH4959> <WH8764> at noonday <WH6672>, as the blind <WH5787> gropeth <WH4959> <WH8762> in darkness <WH653>, and thou shalt not prosper <WH6743> <WH8686> in thy ways <WH1870>: and thou shalt be only oppressed <WH6231> <WH8803> and spoiled <WH1497> <WH8803> evermore <WH3117>, and no man shall save <WH3467> <WH8688> thee.

Thou shalt betroth <WH781> <WH8762> a wife <WH802>, and another <WH312> man <WH376> shall lie <WH7901> <WH8799> <WH8675> <WH7693> <WH8799> with her: thou shalt build <WH1129> <WH8799> an house <WH1004>, and thou shalt not dwell <WH3427> <WH8799> therein: thou shalt plant <WH5193> <WH8799> a vineyard <WH3754>, and shalt not gather the grapes <WH2490> <WH8762> thereof.

Thine ox <WH7794> shall be slain <WH2873> <WH8803> before thine eyes <WH5869>, and thou shalt not eat <WH398> <WH8799> thereof: thine ass <WH2543> shall be violently taken away <WH1497> <WH8803> from before thy face <WH6440>, and shall not be restored <WH7725> <WH8799> to thee: thy sheep <WH6629> shall be given <WH5414> <WH8803> unto thine enemies <WH341> <WH8802>, and thou shalt have none to rescue <WH3467> <WH8688> them.

Thy sons <WH1121> and thy daughters <WH1323> shall be given <WH5414> <WH8803> unto another <WH312> people <WH5971>, and thine eyes <WH5869> shall look <WH7200> <WH8802>, and fail <WH3616> with longing for them all the day <WH3117> long: and there shall be no might <WH410> in thine hand <WH3027>.

The fruit <WH6529> of thy land <WH127>, and all thy labours <WH3018>, shall a nation <WH5971> which thou knowest <WH3045> <WH8804> not eat up <WH398> <WH8799>; and thou shalt be only oppressed <WH6231> <WH8803> and crushed <WH7533> <WH8803> alway <WH3117>:
So that thou shalt be mad <WH7696> <WH8794> for the sight <WH4758> of thine eyes <WH5869> which thou shalt see <WH7200> <WH8799>.

The YY <WH3068> shall smite <WH5221> <WH8686> thee in the knees <WH1290>, and in the legs <WH7785>, with a sore <WH7451> botch <WH7822> that cannot <WH3201> <WH8799> be healed <WH7495> <WH8736>, from the sole <WH3709> of thy foot <WH7272> unto the top of thy head <WH6936>.

The YY <WH3068> shall bring <WH3212> <WH8686> thee, and thy king <WH4428> which thou shalt set <WH6965> <WH8686> over thee, unto a nation <WH1471> which neither thou nor thy fathers <WH1> have known <WH3045> <WH8804>; and there shalt thou serve <WH5647> <WH8804> other <WH312> 'elohim <WH430>, wood <WH6086> and stone <WH68>.
And thou shalt become an astonishment <WH8047>, a proverb <WH4912>, and a byword <WH8148>, among all nations <WH5971> whither the YY <WH3068> shall lead <WH5090> <WH8762> thee.

Thou shalt carry <WH3318> much <WH7227> seed <WH2233> out <WH3318> <WH8686> into the field <WH7704>, and shalt gather <WH622> but little <WH4592> in <WH622> <WH8799>; for the locust <WH697> shall consume <WH2628> <WH8799> it.

Thou shalt plant <WH5193> <WH8799> vineyards <WH3754>, and dress <WH5647> <WH8804> them, but shalt neither drink <WH8354> <WH8799> of the wine <WH3196>, nor gather <WH103> <WH8799> the grapes; for the worms <WH8438> shall eat <WH398> <WH8799> them.

Thou shalt have olive trees <WH2132> throughout all thy coasts <WH1366>, but thou shalt not anoint <WH5480> <WH8799> thyself with the oil <WH8081>; for thine olive <WH2132> shall cast <WH5394> <WH8799> his fruit.
Thou shalt beget <WH3205> <WH8686> sons <WH1121> and daughters <WH1323>, but thou shalt not enjoy them; for they shall go <WH3212> <WH8799> into captivity <WH7628>.
All thy trees <WH6086> and fruit <WH6529> of thy land <WH127> shall the locust <WH6767> consume <WH3423> <WH8762>.
The stranger <WH1616> that is within <WH7130> thee shall get up <WH5927> <WH8799> above thee very <WH4605> high <WH4605>; and thou shalt come down <WH3381> <WH8799> very <WH4295> low <WH4295>.
He shall lend <WH3867> <WH8686> to thee, and thou shalt not lend <WH3867> <WH8686> to him: he shall be the head <WH7218>, and thou shalt be the tail <WH2180>.

Moreover all these curses <WH7045> shall come <WH935> <WH8804> upon thee, and shall pursue <WH7291> <WH8804> thee, and overtake <WH5381> <WH8689> thee, till thou be destroyed <WH8045> <WH8736>; because thou hearkenedst <WH8085> <WH8804> not unto the voice <WH6963> of the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, to keep <WH8104> <WH8800> his Mitzvot <WH4687> and his statutes <WH2708> which he commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> thee:
And they shall be upon thee for a sign <WH226> and for a wonder <WH4159>, and upon thy seed <WH2233> for <WH5704> ever <WH5769>.
Because thou servedst <WH5647> <WH8804> not the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> with joyfulness <WH8057>, and with gladness <WH2898> of heart <WH3824>, for the abundance <WH7230> of all things;

Therefore shalt thou serve <WH5647> <WH8804> thine enemies <WH341> <WH8802> which the YY <WH3068> shall send <WH7971> <WH8762> against thee, in hunger <WH7458>, and in thirst <WH6772>, and in nakedness <WH5903>, and in want <WH2640> of all things: and he shall put <WH5414> <WH8804> a yoke <WH5923> of iron <WH1270> upon thy neck <WH6677>, until he have destroyed <WH8045> <WH8687> thee.

The YY <WH3068> shall bring <WH5375> <WH8799> a nation <WH1471> against thee from far <WH7350>, from the end <WH7097> of the earth <WH776>, as swift as the eagle <WH5404> flieth <WH1675> <WH8799>; a nation <WH1471> whose tongue <WH3956> thou shalt not understand <WH8085> <WH8799>;
A nation <WH1471> of fierce <WH5794> countenance <WH6440>, which shall not regard <WH5375> <WH8799> the person <WH6440> of the old <WH2205>, nor shew favour <WH2603> <WH8799> to the young <WH5288>:

And he shall eat <WH398> <WH8804> the fruit <WH6529> of thy cattle <WH929>, and the fruit <WH6529> of thy land <WH127>, until thou be destroyed <WH8045> <WH8736>: which also shall not leave <WH7604> <WH8686> thee either corn <WH1715>, wine <WH8492>, or oil <WH3323>, or the increase <WH7698> of thy kine <WH504>, or flocks <WH6251> of thy sheep <WH6629>, until he have destroyed <WH6> <WH8687> thee.

And he shall besiege <WH6887> <WH8689> thee in all thy gates <WH8179>, until thy high <WH1364> and fenced <WH1219> <WH8803> walls <WH2346> come down <WH3381> <WH8800>, wherein <WH2004> thou trustedst <WH982> <WH8802>, throughout all thy land <WH776>: and he shall besiege <WH6887> <WH8689> thee in all thy gates <WH8179> throughout all thy land <WH776>, which the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> hath given <WH5414> <WH8804> thee.

And thou shalt eat <WH398> <WH8804> the fruit <WH6529> of thine own body <WH990>, the flesh <WH1320> of thy sons <WH1121> and of thy daughters <WH1323>, which the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> hath given <WH5414> <WH8804> thee, in the siege <WH4692>, and in the straitness <WH4689>, wherewith thine enemies <WH341> <WH8802> shall distress <WH6693> <WH8686> thee:

So that the man <WH376> that is tender <WH7390> among you, and very <WH3966> delicate <WH6028>, his eye <WH5869> shall be evil <WH3415> <WH8799> toward his brother <WH251>, and toward the wife <WH802> of his bosom <WH2436>, and toward the remnant <WH3499> of his children <WH1121> which he shall leave <WH3498> <WH8686>:

So that he will not give <WH5414> <WH8800> to any <WH259> of them of the flesh <WH1320> of his children <WH1121> whom he shall eat <WH398> <WH8799>: because he hath nothing left <WH7604> <WH8689> him in the siege <WH4692>, and in the straitness <WH4689>, wherewith thine enemies <WH341> <WH8802> shall distress <WH6693> <WH8686> thee in all thy gates <WH8179>.

The tender <WH7390> and delicate <WH6028> woman among you, which would not adventure <WH5254> <WH8765> to set <WH3322> <WH8687> the sole <WH3709> of her foot <WH7272> upon the ground <WH776> for delicateness <WH6026> <WH8692> and tenderness <WH7391>, her eye <WH5869> shall be evil <WH3415> <WH8799> toward the husband <WH376> of her bosom <WH2436>, and toward her son <WH1121>, and toward her daughter <WH1323>,

And toward her young one <WH7988> that cometh out <WH3318> <WH8802> from between her feet <WH7272>, and toward her children <WH1121> which she shall bear <WH3205> <WH8799>: for she shall eat <WH398> <WH8799> them for want <WH2640> of all things secretly <WH5643> in the siege <WH4692> and straitness <WH4689>, wherewith thine enemy <WH341> <WH8802> shall distress <WH6693> <WH8686> thee in thy gates <WH8179>.

If thou wilt not observe <WH8104> <WH8799> to do <WH6213> <WH8800> all the words <WH1697> of this Torah <WH8451> that are written <WH3789> <WH8803> in this book <WH5612>, that thou mayest fear <WH3372> <WH8800> this glorious <WH3513> <WH8737> and fearful <WH3372> <WH8737> name <WH8034>, THE YY <WH3068> THY GOD <WH430>;

Then the YY <WH3068> will make <WH6381> thy plagues <WH4347> wonderful <WH6381> <WH8689>, and the plagues <WH4347> of thy seed <WH2233>, even great <WH1419> plagues <WH4347>, and of long continuance <WH539> <WH8737>, and sore <WH7451> sicknesses <WH2483>, and of long continuance <WH539> <WH8737>.

Moreover he will bring <WH7725> <WH8689> upon thee all the diseases <WH4064> of Egypt <WH4714>, which thou wast afraid <WH3025> <WH8804> of <WH6440>; and they shall cleave <WH1692> <WH8804> unto thee.

Also every sickness <WH2483>, and every plague <WH4347>, which is not written <WH3789> <WH8803> in the book <WH5612> of this Torah <WH8451>, them will the YY <WH3068> bring <WH5927> <WH8686> upon thee, until thou be destroyed <WH8045> <WH8736>.

And ye shall be left <WH7604> <WH8738> few <WH4592> in number <WH4962>, whereas <WH834> ye were as the stars <WH3556> of heaven <WH8064> for multitude <WH7230>; because thou wouldest not obey <WH8085> <WH8804> the voice <WH6963> of the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>.

And it shall come to pass, that as the YY <WH3068> rejoiced <WH7797> <WH8804> over you to do you good <WH3190> <WH8687>, and to multiply <WH7235> <WH8687> you; so the YY <WH3068> will rejoice <WH7797> <WH8799> over you to destroy <WH6> <WH8687> you, and to bring you to nought <WH8045> <WH8687>; and ye shall be plucked <WH5255> <WH8738> from off the land <WH127> whither thou goest <WH935> <WH8802> to possess <WH3423> <WH8800> it.

And the YY <WH3068> shall scatter <WH6327> <WH8689> thee among all people <WH5971>, from the one end <WH7097> of the earth <WH776> even unto the other <WH7097>; and there thou shalt serve <WH5647> <WH8804> other <WH312> 'elohim <WH430>, which neither thou nor thy fathers <WH1> have known <WH3045> <WH8804>, even wood <WH6086> and stone <WH68>.

And among these <WH1992> nations <WH1471> shalt thou find no ease <WH7280> <WH8686>, neither shall the sole <WH3709> of thy foot <WH7272> have rest <WH4494>: but the YY <WH3068> shall give <WH5414> <WH8804> thee there a trembling <WH7268> heart <WH3820>, and failing <WH3631> of eyes <WH5869>, and sorrow <WH1671> of mind <WH5315>:

And thy life <WH2416> shall hang <WH8511> <WH8803> in doubt before <WH5048> thee; and thou shalt fear <WH6342> <WH8804> day <WH3119> and night <WH3915>, and shalt have none assurance <WH539> <WH8686> of thy life <WH2416>:

In the morning <WH1242> thou shalt say <WH559> <WH8799>, Would 'Elohim it were <WH5414> <WH8799> even <WH6153> ! and at even <WH6153> thou shalt say <WH559> <WH8799>, Would 'Elohim it were <WH5414> <WH8799> morning <WH1242> ! for the fear <WH6343> of thine heart <WH3824> wherewith thou shalt fear <WH6342> <WH8799>, and for the sight <WH4758> of thine eyes <WH5869> which thou shalt see <WH7200> <WH8799>.

And the YY <WH3068> shall bring <WH7725> thee into Egypt <WH4714> again <WH7725> <WH8689> with ships <WH591>, by the way <WH1870> whereof I spake <WH559> <WH8804> unto thee, Thou shalt see <WH7200> <WH8800> it no more again <WH3254> <WH8686>: and there ye shall be sold <WH4376> <WH8694> unto your enemies <WH341> <WH8802> for bondmen <WH5650> and bondwomen <WH8198>, and no man shall buy <WH7069> <WH8802> you.
